name: Hilton
goal: Hilton is a global hospitality company which manages, franchises, leases and occasionally owns hotels from a portfolio of 14 brands including Waldorf Astoria, Conrad and Hilton Garden Inn. Hilton now has a presence in 25 of the 28 EU member states and these hotels employ around 30,000 people
interests: Borders and Security, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Meeting rounds with EU decision makers on Hilton key priorities including visa and travel facilitation, youth employment and EU tourism policy are regularly organised.
